original_text: When Saul's uncle saw Saul and his servant, he asked them, ‘Where have you been?’ Saul said, ‘We went to look for the donkeys. We could not find them so we went to visit Samuel.’
korean_text: 사울의 숙부가 사울과 그의 사환에게 이르되 너희가 어디로 갔더냐 사울이 이르되 암나귀들을 찾다가 찾지 못하므로 사무엘에게 갔었나이다 하니

sentences.original_text: When Saul's uncle saw Saul and his servant
sentences.korean_translation: 사울의 삼촌이 사울과 그의 종을 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: We went to look for the donkeys
so we went to visit Samuel
